> Could you do that as well with 1.12? I thought there was a JMX Bean
> interface for Heritrix that would allow it to access order.xml files.
>
Yes, but only to a limited degree, and there was no JMX interface for  
overrides at all.
> Are you planning on implementing a cluster monitor? Something that
> will distribute jobs to all the crawlers?
>
Well...no. Not in the immediate future at least. At this point the  
goal is feature parity with hcc in 1.x.
> I didn't know you guys were going in that direction, and implemented
> my own cluster monitor.
>
Interesting; is the code available somewhere?

-Paul
